"A.P.241/3/22/15:30": "What happened before aside, nothing seems off about him. He looks like a regular ARKS member."
"Rather, he's skilled, but slacks off too much. What a waste!"
"What do you think, <%me>? Any thoughts after fighting alongside him?"
"1. Nothing in particular"
"2. Something feels off"
"Your live observation gives your opinion more weight. I'll take your word for it."
"It's probably just me getting overexcited and reading too much into things."
"I agree. Something doesn't feel right. It's as if he's trying to hide something."
"It feels as though his guard shifts focus to us when you're not engaged in combat."
"We should end this investigation soon. Until then, let's keep monitoring him. We'll sort through the details afterwards."
"*Gulp*... They're whispering to themselves and throwing glances at me... I've held back quite a bit too..."
"O-or is it the opposite!? Did they notice me holding back and consider it suspicious?!"
"Uu... My plan completely backfired... No, now's the time to redeem myself! Time to go all o-- Wait, what?"
"...Who's that...?"
"Uwaah!? What's up with this guy!"
"Huh!? <%me>! This huge reaction... A Darker? No, it's stronger than that!"
"There has never been a reading this strong..."
"Did it sense your return and came to have a look...!?"
"No <%me>! Get away from there!"
"It's aiming for you!"
"I don't know what's going on, but this is my time to shine!"
"Alright! Leave it all to me!"
"Okay, no more problem!"
"Hey, did you see that? Awesome, right? I'm an ARKS after all. Even I can do this much. ...When I feel like it, that is."
"Hitsugi, keep your guard up! The readings are still here!"
"Huh? But I've taken care of all the enemies..."
"Wha- my hands... I... can't move!?"
"Wh-what's this?! What's happening to me! ...Somebody help me!"
"1. It's okay, I'll save you."
"2. Calm down, I'll save you."
"O-okay!"
"It's neutralizing the Darker's... No, Dark Falz's power?"
"I see... It's exactly as Xiao said, <%me>'s power..."
"I can... move my hand! Now I can Logout!"
"<%me>! Are you okay?!"
"Darker reactions have disappeared. But where did Hitsugi go?"
